Title: Converts residential rental buildings from being mass-metered to submetered
Summary: Relates to application requirements for private or government entities that wish to provide electric service converting residential rental buildings from being mass-metered to submetered.
LawCode: Ren ยง53 to be ยง54, add ยง53, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to converting residential rental buildings from being mass-metered to submetered
